mapper.insert: insert into apply_delivery_information (send_to,sending_address,delivery_days,send_province_id, send_province_name,send_city_id,send_city_name,send_district_id,send_district_name, apply_supply_company_code,apply_supply_company_name,apply_type,apply_code,apply_status, create_time,create_by,update_time,update_by,delivery_type ) values ( #{sendTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sendingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{deliveryDays,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sendProvinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sendProvinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sendCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sendDistrictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sendDistrictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applySupplyCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applySupplyCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{applyType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryType,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
